item.title: Issaquah cosmetic dentistry - www.issaquahdental.com
item.description: Dr. Hovden always strives to be the best. He has been a faculty member at University of the Pacific School of Dentistry for over 21 years teaching in the endodontic department. He has served on the Executive Board of Directors of the school\'s Alumni Association for over 12 years.

item.title: Issaquah extreme makeover - Cosmetic Dentistry
item.description: When teeth are missing, the conventional porcelain fused-to-metal fixed bridge is most often the treatment of choice. These bridge restorations are permanently fixed cemented in place and offer the patient long term function, durability and life-like cosmetics.

item.title: Seattle Brite Smile - Dental Misfortune and Neglect
item.description: Occasionally, healthy teeth will crack or fracture even under normal chewing loads. if the cracked tooth is diagnosed and treated prior to complete fracture, the treatment is simple: partial or full crown coverage.

item.title: Issaquah dental implants - Cosmetic Enhancement
item.description: Replacement of worn out bonding materials with porcelain veneers can restore lifelike and lasting beauty to the teeth. Porcelain veneer restorations are functional, durable and extremely cosmetic. The cosmetic results frequently exceed the expectation of the patient in even the most challenging cases.

item.title: Seattle dental implants - Direct Adhesion Dentistry
item.description: Fractured teeth can now be repaired with the application of direct adhesion restorative materials in a process commonly called bonding.

item.title: Bellevue Brite Smile - Contact
item.description: Address: 1660 NW Gilman Blvd, Suite C-1, Issaquah, WA 98027.

item.title: Issaquah Brite Smile - Dental Implants
item.description: A very rapidly developing and very promising area of dentistry is the titanium dental implant that becomes integrated with the bone. These new implants are positioned in a site prepared into the bone and left undisturbed for a while. The internal portion of these implants is threaded in order for the dental prosthesis to be attached with small threaded fasteners.

item.title: Seattle porcelain veneers - Dental Implants
item.description: After completion of the healing phase, the implant is uncovered and the dentist can then complete the restorative phase of the treatment.

item.title: Seattle porcelain veneers - Procedures
item.description: TOUCH-UPS Recontouring and Polishing Spot Tissue Recontouring Tooth Whitening and Brightening Dark and Super-white Spot Reduction DIRECT ADHESION DENTISTRY BONDING Blemish Reduction Incisal Edge Chip Repair Root Surface Ditch Repair Anterior & Posterior Composite Restorations Closing Gaps and Spaces LAB-FABRICATED ADHESION DENTISTRY Porcelain Laminate Veneers Cosmetic Enhancement Functional Treatment of Major Tooth Trauma Adhesion Fixed Bridges Porcelain to Composite Porcelain Fused-to-Metal

item.title: Bellevue tooth whitening - Special Offer
item.description: You don\'t have to be rich to have a million dollar smile!
